alert.note: Alert for Central Greenville; Greater Pickens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 9:20PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greenville and east central Pickens Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 920 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Easley, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greenville Downtown, Greenville Eastside, West Greenville, Taylors, Berea, Welcome, Paris Mountain State Park, Cherrydale Point, Furman University and Travelers Rest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
